ModMetaData.name: Unarmed Alert
ModMetaData.author: 1trickPwnyta
ModMetaData.description:
Adds an alert to the game (right side of the screen) when you have one or more colonists who are unarmed. Ignores non-violent, imprisoned, or downed colonists. Settings allow you to include or ignore guests, slaves, and children.
=== Updates === 06/17/2025: Update to 1.6 07/31/2024: Ignore pawns incapable of manipulation 05/07/2024: Ignore pawns in mental state 05/06/2024: Add setting to include or ignore children 04/10/2024: Add settings to include or ignore guests and slaves 04/10/2024: Ignore guests
